string.value: This is your third assignment as an informant and this one involves studying the strange-acting #o1140130#s with #p1103004# in #b#m102000000##k. You'd better go talk to #b#p1103004##k.

#p1103004# seems to already know that the #o1140130#s' erratic behavior was caused by a puppet and tells you to enter #m101030101# to defeat #r100 #o1140130#s#k and retrieve #o1140130#'s puppet. She also says that if you can't find the puppet even after eliminating 100, you should just come back to see her...\r\n\r\nRegardless of Personality #o9101002##r #a217221##k
You defeated 100 #o1140130#s but didn't find any puppets. #p1103004# told you that #o1140130#'s puppet has been detected nearby and that something seems very wrong…

I have been spending some time investigating the strange turn of events that have taken place here at #b#m101030101##k, and the #o1140130#s suddenly becoming violent is one of those issues. I was having a hard time doing all this by myself, but now that you have offered to help, I can finally breathe a sigh of relief. Thank you for coming.

After a number of tests, I came up with the conclusion that the Ghost Stumps are acting strange because of this strange puppet called a #t4032319#. This means we'll have to #reliminate #o1140130#s#k and remove the #t4032319# as well. Maybe defeating #r100#k would help you find one?
It hasn't been long since the #o1140100#s started acting strange. Frankly, I'm not sure which of the two, the #o1140130#s or #o1140100#s, actually carries the puppet.

So #rI just suggest eliminating any form of #o1140100#s#k. Oh by the way, if you manage to defeat all 100 of them, but still can't find a puppet, then just come back here. We'll have to rethink the situation then.
What? Is 100 too few for you? How about 500, or even 1,000? Think about it, then talk to me.
I see that you have defeated 100 #o1140130#s. Did you happen to find the puppet? What, no?
Hmmm… I knew something wasn't right. The detector indicated that the puppet is here somewhere... Maybe they're using a different way of affecting the #o1140130#s' behavior.
I'll try to figure out what other method may be being used. In the mean time, why don't you work on leveling up? I'll see you at Lv. 24.
Haven't you defeated #r100 #o1140130#s#k yet? Even if you can't find a puppet, that's fine. Just come back to me when you finish eliminating the #o1140130#s.
